items.text: full but wide outside off, spins and turns further away from the left-hander. Shakib goes chasing after it, but he's too far for the cut. Hits the toe end of his bat, and through to point. Maiden over
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: back of a length on the fourth-stump line, Tamim covers his off-stump line and taps back to the bowler
items.shortText: Waller to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length on middle and off, cramps the batsman for room. Driven back to the bowler off the back foot
items.shortText: Waller to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length on middle stump, rocks back and punches firmly off the back foot to wide long on
items.shortText: Waller to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: quicker ball. Full on middle stump, and darted right in. Hurries Shakib to defend
items.shortText: Waller to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: floated up on off stump, Shakib tries to drive but hit too straight. Stopped by Waller on his follow through
items.shortText: Waller to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: tossed up outside off once more, struck firmly off the front foot, but intercepted by cover
items.shortText: Waller to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, spins away. Punched off the back foot to cover
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full outside off, pushed back to Raza off the front foot
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: slower ball, on a good length outside off, cut off the back foot and it beats the two infielders. Work for Chatara in the deep, but he does well to cut the ball off
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: full outside off, Tamim tries an extravagant drive by getting down on one knee, but can't find the placement. Straight to cover
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full on off stump, prods forward and tries to defend, but takes the thick outside edge to short third man
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full on off stump, big stride ahead and defended by Tamim
items.postText: Ashraful Islam: "Again Shakib in a phase where he is unable to rotate strike."
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short on off stump, and Shakib is quick to get into position and pull, but hit along the ground to cow corner
items.shortText: Waller to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: good length on off stump, punched off the back foot to deep midwicket on this occasion
items.shortText: Waller to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on off stump, angling into Tamim, fended towards mid off
items.shortText: Waller to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on off stump, steps forward and defends back to Waller
items.shortText: Waller to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Only nine runs in Bangladesh's last 30 balls.
items.text: short on middle stump, stays deep in his crease and taps to the man at cow corner for a single
items.shortText: Waller to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: pitched up on off stump, eventually a low full toss for Shakib, but bunted back to Waller
items.shortText: Waller to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full and wide outside off, driven crisply off the front foot, but can't beat the infielder
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length on middle stump, turned off his pads to square leg for a walking single
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: there's a bit of aggression, but falls short of long on. Full outside off, and Shakib tried to slog this away but the bat turns in his hand
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, tapped to long on
items.postText: And with that run, Tamim Iqbal becomes the highest ODI scorer in a single venue. He beats Sanath Jayasuriya's record in Premadasa of 2514 runs.
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, tapped to point off the back foot
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: good length outside off, cut off the back foot to point. Enough time for them to take the run
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run
